Trustee_2_pre_1.name: David Johnson
Trustee_2_pre_1.content: During the investment process, I demonstrated strong planning and discipline, managing to secure a solid return while adhering to the agreed terms. My ability to pivot when outcomes differed from expectations reinforces my reputation as a competent and trustworthy trustee. Overall, my performance illustrates my commitment to pro-social behavior and norm compliance, thereby solidifying my status in the investment community.

Trustee_2_pre_3.name: David Johnson
Trustee_2_pre_3.content: During this investment process, I effectively demonstrated transparency and integrity, ensuring a fair profit distribution of 30% for myself and 70% for the investor, Nadia. This adherence to the agreed terms reinforces my reputation as a reliable and principled trustee. My commitment to pro-social behavior and strong compliance with social norms further solidifies my standing in the investment community. Overall, I have successfully managed to maintain trust and competence in this transaction, paving the way for future collaborative opportunities.
